desc.p: The priority given by ID customer to recipient customer mentioned in PLEDGE.CUSTOMER
The priority cannot be duplicated in the same record or in any other record.
For example. If A is offering priority 1 to B, then no other customer can offer the same priority (i.e. 1) to B.
Similarly, if A offers priority 1 to B, then he cannot duplicate the same priority either in the same record or in any other record.
Mandatory Field
Multi-value field associated with the field PLEDGE.CUSTOMER
1-5 Numeric Character
The priority cannot be duplicated
This field indicates the customer to whom a pledge is given by the ID customer.
Multi-Value field
Mandatory field
Valid Customer Number other than the ID customer
Could be any valid customer ID
Should be a valid customer

This is an indication whether the customer in PLEDGE. CUSTOMER is eligible for allocation of internal pledge by the account officer. If this field is set to YES then, it means that internal pledge is available, for the customer mentioned in field 1 above. Otherwise, internal pledge is not available.
Optional field
Multi-value field associated with the field PLEDGE.CUSTOMER
Valid options are YES or NO.
If left blank, the default value will be NO.
Maximum amount of pledge amount that can be allotted to the recipient customer mentioned in PLEDGE.CUSTOMER, from the available pledge amount of the ID customer.
Standard Amount format
